page.title: 17Highfield Road "Chippy".
page.content: People queue around the shop, talking whilst they are waiting to buy fish & chips to take away. Daily frying times are Lunch - 11.30a.m. - 1.00p.m. Tea - 4.l5p.m. - 6.15p.m. Supper - 9.00p.m. -12.00p.m. On Sundays the shop is closed. As well as fish, chips & mushy peas, there are more than 20 items on the menu ranging from 'specials' at 7p, chip barms at 25p, to chicken breast chips & peas costing Â£1.31. 'Specials' are a local dish made from a thin slice of potato dipped in batter and deep fried. Mr.& Mrs. Whittaker, the owners, use 1 tonne of potatoes and 130kg. of fish every week. They get up to prepare the food at 6.45a.m. and finish work when they have cleaned the shop at 1.00a.m. Leesa Howcroft.
